咨.definition: variant of 諮|咨[zi1]; used in 咨文[zi1wen2]; used in 咨嗟[zi1jie1]

咨嗟.definition: (literary) to sigh; to heave a sigh; (literary) to gasp in admiration

咨文.definition: (old) official communication (between government offices of equal rank); report delivered by the head of government on affairs of state

咨請.definition: to formally request (by means of an official communication 咨文[zi1wen2])
